transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji mam.
Customer: Haan good afternoon sir.
Executive: Ji good afternoon. Haan sir wo actually call abhi recorded time pe hai main aapko bata du kyuki abhi jo aapka concern tha na 96 wale pe aapne call laga di thi is vajah se company ke number se hi call ja rahi hai.
Hm hm.
Executive: Haan. To main ye bol rahi thi ki aap jab TrustSeal ke liye ek to bol rahe the aur aap bol rahe the uske liye leads ke liye right?
Hm hm hm.
Executive: Haan to main batati hu aapko. Leads ka ek bar main check kar leti hu ek to shayad aapne catalog mein dobara se koi new products add kiye hain?
Customer: Hm hm do teen kare hue hain add.
Executive: Haan sir abhi na catalog ka score bhi kafi kam ja raha hai to aap mujhe ye bataoge ki aap kis time available rehte ho agar aap ya fir jo bhi koi sambhalta hai agar video meeting pe aake ek bar aap ye sari details fill kara dete kyuki ye details to aapko hi jyada pata hai na.
Customer: Achcha. Haan.
Executive: Wo TrustSeal wala kya rahega process wo bataiye na mere ko.
Executive: TrustSeal wala main batati hu aapko aap ek bar meri mam se baat kar lo meri side mein hi baithi hain. Kya keh rahe ho?
Executive: Aapko samjha dungi. Meri aap meri manager se baat kar lo mere side mein baithi hain main bata dungi. Kaunsi mam hai kaunsi mam hai?
Executive: Haan Nidhi mam hai meri manager hain aapko achche se samjha dengi. Nidhi mam hain? Naam kya hai unka? Nidhi mam. Unse nahi unse karni nahi hai mere ko baat.
Executive: Haan? Unse baat nahi karni mere ko.
Executive: Achcha achcha to main fir aapko chalo main TrustSeal ke bare mein bata deti hu aap mujhe bataiye aap kab tak ka plan kar rahe ho?
Customer: Main to agar aap koi guarantee vagaira lete ho to main to aaj hi karwa dunga.
Executive: Haan guarantee leads ki. Hm hm TrustSeal ki ki response aayega kuch.
Executive: TrustSeal ka dekho TrustSeal ka response main aapko bata deti hu MDC ek hamara basic plan hota hai jisme aapko leads bhi usi type ki milti hai jab aap uske aage TrustSeal mein jate ho TrustSeal mein aapko bahut sare benefits hote hain pehle pehli cheez to aapki jo leads hai wahi double ho jayengi. Thik hai aapko leads jyada milengi aapke pass inquiry jyada aayengi haan aapka jo portal hai aap ye samajh lo ki jahan aap shop main aapko ek chota sa example leti hu jahan aap 100 competitor mein aa rahe the na ab aap unme se one to five competitors mein show karoge. Thik hai. Jo aapka competition level hai wo automatically hi reduce ho jayega. Wo bataiye mere mera payment kitna bach raha hai isme abhi available kitna payment hai isme? Sir wo payment to aapka na adjust ho jayega.
Han wo to adjust ho jayega tabhi to puch raha hu kitna bach raha hai kitna dena padega offer kya hai vagaira sab kuch bataiye mujhe aur whatsapp aapne bola tha wo whatsapp kariye aap.
Executive: Ye sab minus karke haan haan main ye sari cheeze minus karke jo aapka bacha hai aur jo aapka adjust hoke ho jayega thik hai wo details ek to main aapko bhejti hu aapko whatsapp kar dungi plus aap mujhe ye bataiye ki aap agar video meeting pe aa sakte ho to batao. Abhi nahi aa sakta main thoda kaam ja raha hu. Video meeting pe na main haan video meeting pe ya fir wo TrustSeal lunga na usi mein karwaunga pura do member bande bithaunga usi mein fir pura kaam hoga. Haan TrustSeal ka aapke liye achcha rahega kyuki maine jab aapne TrustSeal ki baat kari thi maine dekhe hue the products jo competitors bhi hai maine wo bhi dekhe the to usse ye bhi pata chal jata hai ki competitor kitne achche se deal kar rahe hain IndiaMART mein hi hai wo log bhi jinhone TrustSeal liya hua hai. Thik hai. To automatically isme aapko jyada benefit milega plus aapko TrustSeal ka certificate milega TrustSeal ka logo milega to koi bhi aake agar aapki website bhi dekh raha hai to usko khud hi believe ho jayega ki haan TrustSeal ka agar logo hai certificate hai kyuki verified hai thik hai to usme trust jyada built hota hai samne wale ka bhi ab aapko koi cheez aise hi normal wali dikhe ek side aapko verified wali dikhe. Hm hm. Thik hai haan uske proof ke sath to aap bhi proof wale pe jyada focus karte ho. Same isme 100% sure hai na ki response to aayega na isme TrustSeal mein. 100 haan sir 100% sure hu main is cheez mein. Haan to aap mere ko pehle ek bar whatsapp detail vagaira bhejiye. Haan puri kya payment bach raha hai kitna offer chal raha hai kitna payment dena padega vagaira. Sir main batau aur ek cheez main aapko ye batau jis agar aap November mein hi karate ho to aapko offer bhi mil jayega. Kya mil jayega? Agar aap isi month mein karate ho na November mein bhi do char din mein kara doge to aapko achcha benefit bhi mil jayega offer bhi mil jayega. Haan to wahi to main to bol raha hu na main to lena chahta hu bas aap mujhe wo response dena chahiye na wo aap mujhe bata do ki aap bilkul 100% response milega main to aaj hi payment kar dunga. Main to payment karne ke liye baitha hu na wahi hai ab aap kuch guarantee vagaira lo uske according batao na mujhe mere kya main to laga. Main aap bol rahe ho aap Nidhi mam se baat nahi karoge ek aur mam hai Shweta mam hai. Dekho mam jo meri help kara sakta hai usse baat karunga unse main bilkul unko to saaf bol ke rakha hai mere ko mere call bhi nahi karna chahiye mere ko unse baat hi nahi karta main. Chaliye koi baat nahi koi baat nahi. Wo layak hi nahi yaar bandi wo hai kuch bolti isliye. Chaliye main aapko na details share karti hu thik hai. Thik hai aap details send kariye mere ko. Thik hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know TrustSeal process.

- Wants to know payment details and offers.

- Expresses dissatisfaction with a previous executive.



Resolution:

- Executive explained TrustSeal benefits.

- Executive offered to send payment details via WhatsApp.

- Executive offered video meeting for catalog details.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send payment details via WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, payment, catalog, leads, offer
